mapper.insert: insert into apply_record (student_id, title, category, description, score, status, create_time, update_time) values (#{stuid},#{a.title},#{a.category},#{a.description},#{a.score},"待审核",now(),now())

update apply_record
title = #{a.title},
category = #{a.category},
description = #{a.description},
score = #{a.score},

where id = #{a.id}
mapper.select:
SELECT ar.id, u.username, u.id AS student_id, -- 假设 student_id 来自 user 表的 id u.major, -- 假设 major 来自 user 表 u.grade, -- 假设 grade 来自 user 表 ar.title, ar.description, ar.category, ar.score, ar.status, ar.create_time AS createTime, ar.update_time AS updateTime, GROUP_CONCAT( am.image_list SEPARATOR ',' -- 使用逗号作为分隔符 ) AS imageListStr -- 将图片路径聚合为一个字符串 FROM apply_record ar INNER JOIN user u ON ar.student_id = u.id -- 关联用户表 LEFT JOIN apply_material am ON ar.id = am.apply_id -- 左关联材料表，保证没有材料的申请也能查出
AND u.username LIKE CONCAT('%', #{username}, '%')
AND ar.status = #{status}
GROUP BY ar.id, u.id -- 按申请ID和用户ID分组，聚合图片路径 ORDER BY ar.update_time DESC
